description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Unleash your Inner Ninja! Avatar Trials: Ninja Uprising is a third person platforming game. Using parkour and free running movement, use your Avatar to navigate three challenging levels influenced by Assassin's Creed and Ninja Warrior. You've never seen Avatars like this before - Master your skills to become a true ninja!
description.short: Unleash your Inner Ninja! Avatar Trials: Ninja Uprising is a third person platforming game. Using parkour and free running movement, use your Avatar to navigate three challenging levels influenced by Assassin's Creed and Ninja Warrior. You've never seen Avatars like this before - Master your skills to become a true ninja!
